solution_line_template: Janessa starts with {initial_cards_janessa} cards + {cards_from_father} cards = <<{initial_cards_janessa}+{cards_from_father}={cards_before_ebay}>>{cards_before_ebay} cards.
She adds {cards_before_ebay} cards + {ebay_cards} cards = <<{cards_before_ebay}+{ebay_cards}={cards_after_ebay}>>{cards_after_ebay} cards from the eBay purchase.
Janessa decides to throw away {cards_after_ebay} cards - {damaged_cards} cards = <<{cards_after_ebay}-{damaged_cards}={cards_after_damage}>>{cards_after_damage} cards due to damage.

After giving Dexter the present we know that Janessa kept {cards_after_damage} cards - {cards_given_to_dexter} cards = <<{cards_after_damage}-{cards_given_to_dexter}={cards_kept_by_janessa}>>{cards_kept_by_janessa} cards for herself.
